Module org.alindner.cish.lang
Package org.alindner.cish.lang

Class IO

java.lang.Object
org.alindner.cish.lang.IO
public class IO
extends Object
A class which holds static methods to interact with the filesystem
Author:
alindner

      public static CiFile createTempDir()

    • listDirs

      public static org.alindner.cish.lang.file.FileExecutor listDirs​(CiFile path)
      List all directories recursive in a given path

      it will start by the given root directory and walks down for each subdirectory.

      Parameters:
      path - path
      Returns:
      Executor

    • toOctal

      public static String toOctal​(int charAt)
      convert a number, given as char, to it's unix octal permission representation.

      this number can be shown by using `ls -l` and stat -c '%a %n' *` or `ls -l | awk '{k=0;for(i=0;i<=8;i++)k+=((substr($1,i+2,1)~/[rwx]/) 2^(8-i));if(k)printf("%0o ",k);print}'`

      Parameters:
      charAt - number representation
      Returns:
      octal representation

    • executable

      public static boolean executable​(String file, boolean isExecutable)
      make a given file executable
      Parameters:
      file - file
      isExecutable - should the file be executable
      Returns:
      if it was successful
